pages.text: Can be enchanted with Speed and Range, default is 1 teleport per second and entity spawns directly below the connected pedestal (based on pedestal direction)$(br)Uses Enderpearls (16 fuel) or Chorus Fruit (4 Fuel) to Teleport Players, Mobs, and ItemStacks up to 40 blocks away.

Will not teleport if:$(li)The destination is blocked.(Can teleport into fluids though)$(li)Destination pedestal is being powered by redstone.$(li)If there is no fuel left.$(br)Each block teleported uses 1 unit of fuel. (1-24 units used max) [Range Enchant will allow for more block distance to be teleported over, at no additional cost]$(br)[Warning] If there is not enough fuel to teleport to the location, the teleport will 'fail' teleporting the entity to a random location based on remaining fuel, the 'failed' teleport consumes all remaining fuel.
